name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ask Plan Go! for Google Maps

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ask Plan Go is a browser extension for google maps that helps you to plan your trips and save your favorite places.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AskPlanGO! integrates the power of generative AI to enhance your Google Map experience. This intelligent assistant leverages advanced language models to provide instant, accurate answers to all your travel-related questions directly within the Google Maps interface. Use AskPlanGo! to create itineraries, learn more about a destination or even get travel ideas! 

Whether you're planning a trip, exploring a new city, or simply curious about a location, AskPlanGO! is your one stop go-to travel companion. No need to browser tab hopping to read travel blogs, ask ChatGPT and come back to maps to plot your destination - you can do all of these simultaneously now in the familiar Google Map interface. Upgrade your Google Maps experience today and spend more time exploring and less time planning. 

To activate the assistant, open google maps and simply click on the logo to your right. You can interact with the AI assistant using the chat box and see results in the map.

Ask Plan GO! is FREE to use.
